items.name: eve-ng
items.description: EVE-NG is a network emulator that supports virtualized network environments.

items.name: GNS3
items.description: GNS3 is a network software emulator that allows the combination of virtual and real devices.

items.name: Containerlab
items.description: Nokia Containerlab is a container-based network emulation tool that allows you to define and deploy complex network topologies.

items.name: Cisco Modeling Labs
items.description: Cisco Modeling Labs is a network simulation platform that allows you to design, build, and test network topologies.

items.name: netlab
items.description: netlab is a network lab builder and CLI tool that creates virtual network labs using libvirt, Docker, or Podman containers. It supports multiple virtualization providers and network operating systems.

items.name: NRX
items.description: NRX (netreplica exporter) is a network topology exporter that reads network topology graphs from NetBox DCIM system and exports them to various formats including Containerlab, Cisco Modeling Labs, network visualization formats, and custom formats via Jinja2 templates.
